panels.visual: Remaining mephits dissipating into colored dust No longer hostile Floating harmlessly away **Sound EFFECTS:** "whoosh..."
Drow conspirators slipping into shadows Or surrendering, uncertain
panels.dialogue: Drow: "We were told this would free us from prejudice..." Malrik: "Not this way. Never this way."

panels.visual: Val and Pocky stirring, waking Lunara and Prismor helping them up
panels.dialogue: Val: "What... what happened?" Lunara: "You went down. But we won."

panels.visual: Sorrel in dragon form, glowing in starlight Wings spread majestically
panels.dialogue: Sorrel: "You have restored the balance that was lost for a century. This is your legacy."
